28c02813-beef-4dab-9595-b0fa037064a9.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of creating value in the solution by articulating the benefits for the customer's unique business in a compelling and impactful way.
28c02813-beef-4dab-9595-b0fa037064a9.name: Intuit Sales Certification Program Solutions Expert Level 100

58a36bb4-d071-4442-a354-5ed0f130d261.description: Earners of this badge have foundational knowledge of guiding customers in maximizing the productivity and efficiency of their technology stack through the application and demonstration of technical expertise while effectively leveraging internal systems and tools.
58a36bb4-d071-4442-a354-5ed0f130d261.name: Intuit Sales Certification Program Technology Advocate Level 100

Relevant course work includes: technology insights, technology analysis, technology terminology, and internal systems and tools exploration.

9f3f89ae-e6fc-49d9-aa15-a87720f4b809.description: Earners of the Intuit Messaging Strategy badge have a fundamental understanding of how to develop the tried and tested messaging framework needed to clearly and impactfully communicate a value proposition and story.
